name: Bullet Blast (CastAlmania Productions)
description:
Bullet Blast takes advantage of modern AI, most of the art and code was generated by AI, but monitored by a human of course!

THIS PROJECT IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT!

A BETA PREVIEW IS AVAILABLE, THE GAME IS EMBEDED INTO THIS PAGE!

CONTROLS:

E - FIRE

Move the mouse to turn the player

Bullet Blast is an action-packed video game that puts you in the middle of a dangerous situation. As the player, you find yourself stranded in a field with enemies all around you. Armed only with your trusty weapon, you must fight off wave after wave of enemies to survive.

In Bullet Blast, your goal is to eliminate all of your enemies while avoiding their attacks. You can use your bullets to destroy your enemies, but be careful because they can also send you back. You must use your quick reflexes and strategic thinking to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.

The game is free to play, and it can only be played on a laptop or PC. However, the price may be subject to change in the future. If Bullet Blast gains popularity, it may become a paid game, or a new version with ads may be released.

Bullet Blast is a thrilling and challenging game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. With its fast-paced action and intense gameplay, you will be hooked from the first bullet fired. So, what are you waiting for? Grab your weapon and get ready to blast your way to victory!
